mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM (select a.*,b.enterprise_name as enterprise_name FROM (select a.*,b.name as area_name FROM format_origin_record_ex as a LEFT JOIN sys_area as b on a.area=b.id) as a LEFT JOIN supervision_enterprise as b on a.enterprise = b.id)as a WHERE 1=1
AND a.enterprise_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.enterprise},'%') AND a.area_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.area},'%') AND a.origin_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.type},'%') AND a.origin_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.name},'%') AND a.record_time >= #{search.start1} AND a.record_time <= #{search.end1}

SELECT * FROM (select a.*,b.enterprise_name as enterprise_name FROM (select a.*,b.name as area_name FROM format_origin_record_ex as a LEFT JOIN sys_area as b on a.area=b.id) as a LEFT JOIN supervision_enterprise as b on a.enterprise = b.id)as a WHERE 1=1
AND a.enterprise_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.enterprise},'%') AND a.area_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.area},'%') AND a.origin_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.type},'%') AND a.origin_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.name},'%') AND a.record_time >= #{search.start1} AND a.record_time <= #{search.end1} order by id desc limit #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize}

insert into format_origin_record_ex (enterprise, area, origin_type,record_time,origin_name,origin_type_ex,producer,brand,net_content,produce_time,keep_time,keep_time_type,dead_time,goods_in,goods_type,supplier,supplier_type,goods_out,goods,state,money,person,document,operator, operator_ip,operator_time) values
( #{formatOriginRecordEx.enterprise}, #{formatOriginRecordEx.area},#{formatOriginRecordEx.originType}, #{formatOriginRecordEx.recordTime},#{formatOriginRecordEx.originName},#{formatOriginRecordEx.originTypeEx}, #{formatOriginRecordEx.producer},#{formatOriginRecordEx.brand},#{formatOriginRecordEx.netContent}, #{formatOriginRecordEx.produceTime},#{formatOriginRecordEx.keepTime},#{formatOriginRecordEx.keepTimeType},#{formatOriginRecordEx.deadTime}, #{formatOriginRecordEx.goodsIn},#{formatOriginRecordEx.goodsType},#{formatOriginRecordEx.supplier},#{formatOriginRecordEx.supplierType}, #{formatOriginRecordEx.goodsOut},#{formatOriginRecordEx.goods},#{formatOriginRecordEx.state},#{formatOriginRecordEx.money}, #{formatOriginRecordEx.person},#{formatOriginRecordEx.document}, #{formatOriginRecordEx.operator},#{formatOriginRecordEx.operatorIp}, #{formatOriginRecordEx.operatorTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.bill_id, c.name name, c.picture picture, c.date date FROM format_origin_record_ex a LEFT JOIN origin_record_bill b on a.id = b.record_id LEFT JOIN bill_report c on c.id = b.bill_id Where record_time >= #{startDate} AND record_time < #{endDate}
